author: Melissa Bohse
text: Has anyone worked through the purchase of a utility and the design of a governance structure?  I am curious what models are out there (for example, governed by governing body, governed by advisory commission, governed by elected or appointed users).  Has anyone completed a similar study that they are willing to share?  Or, do you have a governance structure that is working well for you that you are willing to share?
title: Municipal Water/Sewer/Utility Commission Governance
